sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
assemble
se zberejo v skupino, navadno z določenim namenom.

seg.quote: The witnesses would assemble in the Detective Sergeant's room.
She announced to the assembled relatives that she intended to move abroad.

sense.def:
To assemble something
pomeni nekaj narediti iz sestavnih delov.

To assemble a number of objects or facts
pomeni spraviti skupaj več predmetov ali dejstev.

seg.quote: She began to assemble her belongings.
His job was to assemble the facts.
